pullRequest.title: Not-Stocked products not invoicable unless InvoiceRule is immediate
pullRequest.bodyText:
take the product more into account; if it's not stocked, then go with the ordered quantity
also

fix a bunch of tests that failed now that IsStocked is a thing
introduce ProductType enum and clean up IProductBL accordingly
do more logging
#6184

commit.message:
Not-Stocked products not invoicable unless InvoiceRule is immediate

* take the product more into account; if it's *not* stocked, then go with the ordered quantity
* also
  * fix a bunch of tests that failed now that IsStocked is a thing
  * introduce ProductType enum and clean up IProductBL accordingly
  * do more logging
#6184

Not-Item products not invoicable unless InvoiceRule is immediate

* fix unit tests
* additional minor improvements
#6184

Not-Item products not invoicable unless InvoiceRule is immediate

* add unit tests
#6184
